input.sentences: it was early morning and i decided to visit my friend .
i hopped into my car and began the long drive .
it would take quite some time to get there but there were plenty of great sights along the way .
after driving for a few hours i was almost there .
finally arrived ! i can see his house from here .
output.sentences: I wanted to visit my friend in the morning
So I hop into my car and started to drive
During the time I spent driving I spent time looking at the sites that were plentiful
In total I spent 10 hours driving
But after the 10 hours I finally arrived at my friends house
